basics.name: Sam Voisin
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary: I am a driven and results-oriented data scientist with extensive experience in designing and implementing innovative data pipelines, models, and algorithms.
basics.skills: Predictive modeling - Bayesian and classical statistics - Topological and geometric data analysis - Deep learning - Natural language processing - Advanced Python skill - Linux/Unix & Docker

work.name: Infinia ML, Durham, NC
work.summary: Developed flexible document processing pipelines for information extraction and classification. Designed and implemented large language model (LLM) infrastructure.

work.name: Geometric Data Analytics, Inc, Durham, NC
work.summary: Research and development for clients including DARPA, NRL, and AFRL. Developed novel algorithms for oceanographic research, remote sensing, and pattern-of-life modeling. See publications.

work.name: Duke University, Durham, NC
work.summary: Crafted research goals, planned and executed experiments, designed data pipelines, and optimized MCMC samplers for Bayesian hierarchical regression models.

work.name: Ally Financial Services, Charlotte, NC
work.summary: Analyzed financial market data and business metrics to mitigate business risk. Automated data gathering and processing. Acted as program lead and mentor for department internship program.

education.institution: Duke University, Trinity College of Arts and Sciences
education.thesis: Graph Diffusion Methods for Gesture Classification

education.institution: Clemson University, College of Business and Behavioral Science

awards.title: University of South Carolina Big Data Health Science Conference 2020
awards.awarder: UofSC Big Data Health Science Center
awards.summary: First place at UofSC Big Data Health Science Conference 2020 case study competition. The objective of the case study was to develop a platform to aid first responders in diagnosing chemical exposure. We developed an interpretable nearest-neighbors model to transparently diagnose exposure to a wide variety of chemical agents.
